business.headline: What is 'Black Monday' stock market crash? Know why it's making headlines againOn Friday, April 4, 2025, the US stock market had its worst day since the Covid-19 crash. More than $5 trillion was erased in a matter of hours as stocks plummeted, and volatility soared.

Stock market crash: What should investors do as Trump tariffs batter portfolios?Dalal Street is bleeding as global turmoil deepens amid Trump's tariff shock. Read on to find out what investors should do now amid the chaos and confusion.

India's worst stock market crashes: From Covid-19 to Trump tariffsOn Monday, April 7, the Indian stock market faced one of its biggest falls since June 2024. The Sensex fell nearly 4,000 points, while the Nifty 50 slipped below 21,750, dragging down investor confidence.

Stock market crash: Which sectors have been hit hardest today?All sectors ended deep in the red, triggering sharp wealth erosion for investors. Some bore steeper losses than others. Here's a breakdown of the hardest-hit sectors in today's session.

Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 10% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors' stock has seen a steady decline over the past few months. It has fallen by 17.12% in the last five trading days alone. In the past six months, the stock is down by 39.42%. Over the last one year, it has lost 44.50% of its value.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 reasons behind stock market crashShare market crash: Dalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

Rs 19 lakh crore wealth wiped out on Dalal Street; no stock trades in greenThe sharp fall in the stock market followed a global selloff triggered by rising trade tensions and growing fears of a recession in the United States. Markets around the world have come under pressure, and Indian stocks were no exception.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

Sensex falls to 10-month low, Rs 19 lakh crore wiped out amid Trump tariff shockShare market crash: With today's stock market plunge, the Sensex and Nifty have fallen to their lowest levels in approximately 10 months, and analysts suggest that they could fall further due to massive volatility in global markets.

Stocks to watch on April 7: Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd BankShares of firms such as Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd Bank, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, TVS, Bajaj Housing Finance, YES Bank etc. will be in focus today due to important developments.

Asian markets plunge as Trump tariffs spark global sell-off; Nikkei dives nearly 8%Asian markets tumbled sharply following Wall Street's crash, triggered by Trump's tariff escalation and Beijing's retaliation. Japan's Nikkei led the losses, diving nearly 8%, as recession fears gripped investors.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

'Black Monday': US expert warns Trump tariffs could trigger worst crash since 1987Jim Cramer warned that markets might face a bloodbath similar to 1987 - when the Dow Jones suffered its biggest single-day crash to date. He claimed that if the US President didn't 'reach out' to nations which have not imposed retaliatory tariffs and reward them for their compliance, the situation could worsen.

Piyush Goyal announces helpline for startups days after 'dukandari' jibe at themDays after questioning the innovation of Indian startups overtly focussing on food delivery and betting and fantasy sports apps, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal announced a helpline for startups if they wanted to make suggestions or file complaints.

How China-US trade war unfolded: A timeline of tariffs and countermovesChina is responding forcefully to Trump's latest tariffs with a 34% tax on US imports, rare earth export curbs, company bans, and WTO action, raising fears of another full-blown trade war.

Jaguar Land Rover to suspend shipments to US over tariffs on BritainJaguar Land Rover, which is owned by India's Tata Motors, confirmed the temporary export suspension after the Times newspaper reported the plan.

JP Morgan warns of 60% chance of global recession after Trump's tariffsFollowing the US-China trade war, global investment firm J.P. Morgan said it now sees a 60% chance of the global economy entering recession by year-end, up from 40% previously.

Wall Street shatters as Trump tariffs trigger worst day in US markets since 2020US markets suffered their steepest decline since 2020 after China retaliated against Trump's tariffs. The S&P 500 fell 6%, fuelling recession fears and intensifying investor anxiety across global markets.

Dow crashes 2,000 points as Trump's tariffs spark global market panicGlobal markets plunged as Trump's tariffs triggered a trade war escalation with China. The Dow fell over 2,000 points, crude prices tumbled, and investors feared an impending global recession.

Higher inflation, slower growth: US Federal Reserve chair warns after Trump tariffsUS Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell spoke as global markets continued a swoon that has wiped some 10 per cent off major US stock indexes since Trump announced a raft of new tariffs on Wednesday.

US stocks plummet after China's retaliatory levies in response to Trump tariffsNasdaq IXIC dropped more than 20 per cent from its all-time closing high touched in December, putting it on course to confirm a bear market.
Income tax return 2025: ITR-2 filing now made easierITR-2 is meant for individuals whose annual income is above Rs 50 lakh or who earn from sources like rent, capital gains, or other sources.

Sensex tumbles over 900 points, Nifty ends below 23,000; IT, metal stocks crashThe S&P BSE Sensex tumbled 930.67 points to 75,364.69 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 tumbled 345.65 points to settle at 22,904.45.

IT stocks bleed as market crashes. Why TCS, Infosys, Wipro shares are down?All major IT stocks declined as fears of a US recession led to heavy selling. IT companies earn a large portion of their revenue from the US market, and concerns about a slowdown in technology spending have further weakened investor sentiment.

With 'fancy ice-cream' jab, Piyush Goyal's cold message to Shark Tank judgesPiyush Goyal row: While flagging the trend of Indian startups focusing on 'fancy ice creams' and food delivery apps, Piyush Goyal drew a parallel with China to pitch for more innovation in deep-tech.

RIL share price falls 4% ahead of Q4 results. Should you sell?Reliance Industries stock: RIL shares opened at Rs 1,240 and fell to an intraday low of Rs 1,192.85 in the afternoon session. The stock was close to its 52-week low of Rs 1,156, which it touched on March 3, 2025.

US tariffs stay at 26% as White House unveils new trade documentInitially, India's tariff rate was mentioned as 27% in the earlier version of the White House annex. However, the latest revision has adjusted it to 26%.

Withdrawing EPF? Know rules for marriage, education, home and medical needsIf you require money out of your EPF for the purposes of marriage or further studies, there are set regulations one needs to adhere to. You must have been an EPF member for at least seven years and must have at least Rs 1,000 in your EPF account.

Politicians need reality check, says Ashneer Grover on Piyush Goyal's startup remarkAshneer Grover has said that Indian politicians need a reality check after Piyush Goyal criticised startups for being too focused on food delivery apps.

Pension rules updates: 8 RBI guidelines every pensioner must knowIf a bank accidentally credits more pension than it should to a pensioner, then the bank must consult the Pension Sanctioning Authority before recovering the extra money.
Explained: Why Tata Motors share price has fallen 5% todayTata Motors share price: Tata Motors has gone down 8.68% in the last 5 days, 33.43% in the past month and 38.75% in the last year.

Piyush Goyal slams Indian startups, urges to shift focus from food delivery appsUnion Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal criticised India's startup ecosystem, saying it's too focused on food delivery, betting, and fantasy sports apps. In contrast, he praised Chinese startups for prioritising advanced tech like EVs, batteries, semiconductors, and AI, urging Indian innovators to shift toward deeper, tech-driven innovation.

Sensex crashes 1,000 points: 3 reasons behind today's stock market bloodbathStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 965.90 points to 75,329.46, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 361.10 points to 22,889.00 as of 2:08 pm.

Storm of protest from startups after Minister Piyush Goyal's 'dukaandari' jibeStartup ecosystem leaders' response came after Piyush Goyal took a firm stance and said that while Indian startups were busy building food delivery platforms and fantasy gaming apps, those in countries like China were working on EVs, semiconductors, batteries, and AI.

Sensex tanks over 700 points as Wall Street bloodbath sinks Indian IT stocksStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex was down 698.89 points to 75,596.47 at around 10:06 am, while the NSE Nifty50 was trading 269.50 points lower at 22,980.60.

Trump's tariff jitters hit US stocks: Will Sensex, Nifty feel the heat today?The extensive tariff announcements by the US government have raised concerns about a global recession, leading to sharp losses in stock markets worldwide.

Stocks to watch on April 4: Shares in news; HDFC Bank, Zomato, DMartStocks in news today: In Friday's session, shares of Zomato, Nestle India, HDFC Bank, DMart, Mazagon Dock, Bajaj Finance, and others will be in focus due to key corporate developments and financial updates.

Dukaandari hi karni hai? Piyush Goyal slams startups stuck on food deliveryCommerce Minister Piyush Goyal asked Indian startups to shift their focus from food delivery apps to high-tech sectors like semiconductors and AI.

Trump tariff blitz wrecks Wall Street, markets suffer biggest fall since CovidTrump's sweeping tariffs sent shockwaves through financial markets, with Wall Street suffering its worst decline since 2020. Analysts warn of economic slowdowns, surging inflation, and a potential recession.

US tech, retail stocks lead rout after Trump's tariff blowTrump's broad tariffs send US markets into a tailspin, with tech, retail, and banking stocks plunging. Apple, Walmart, and Nike face rising costs, while energy prices drop amid economic concerns.

entertainment.headline: Tom Cruise praises Brad Pitt's driving skills, eager to see F1Hollywood star Tom Cruise has praised former co-star Brad Pitt's driving skills in a new interview. The actors had previously shared screen space in Interview with the Vampire (1994).

Karma review: A sharp, gritty tangle of fate and retributionReleased-Fri Apr 04, 2025Karma Kdrama review: The series delves into the intricacies of fate intertwined with retribution in a sharp and gritty narrative. Itmasterfully portrays the consequences of actions through its compelling storyline.

Filmmaker Tahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapses, says 'Round 2, but I got this'Tahira Kashyap said she's 'still got this' while expressing her positive outlook towards life in a post mentioning her battle with breast cancer for the second time.

Kareena Kapoor joins sons Taimur, Jeh at football match, chats with fansActor Kareena Kapoor Khan accompanied her sons, Taimur and Jeh, to a football match on Sunday. There, she not only greeted several fans but also took the time to interact with them and sign autographs.

Malavika Mohanan slams fan for questioning age gap between her and MohanlalActor Malavika Mohanan has slammed the internet for raising questions about her and co-star Mohanlal's age gap. The two will soon be seen sharing screen space in the Malayalam film Hridayapoorvam.

Indian Idol 15 winner Manasi Ghosh: Want to collab with AR Rahman, Sonu NigamKolkata's Manasi Ghosh was crowned the winner of Indian Idol 15 on Sunday. In an exclusive chat, she shared her aspirations of collaborating with music legends like AR Rahman and Sonu Nigam. She emphasised her journey of hard work, diverse singing capabilities, and future plans.

Jaya Bachchan loses cool at elderly fan during Manoj Kumar's prayer meetAt the prayer tribute for the late Manoj Kumar in Mumbai, a video of Jaya Bachchan's interaction with an elderly woman went viral, sparking reactions on social media. The veteran actor appeared miffed when the fan requested a photo.
Mohanlal's Thudaram locks April release, actor unveils new posterAfter Empuraan, Mohanlal is set to star in the family-drama Thudaram. Directed by Tharun Moorthy, the film will release in April.

No heroes, No villains: Test examines life's morality in thrilling Super OverMadhavan, Nayanthara and Siddharth-starrer 'Test' is an intense drama exploring the morality of the lead characters. The film is streaming on Netflix.

Sikandar box office Day 8: Salman Khan's biggest dip so far, even behind Jai Ho'Sikandar' is Salman Khan's 18th film to enter the Rs 100 cror-club. It is, however, the lowest Rs 100 crore grosser on that list. The film collected Rs 102.25 crore after eight days domestically.

Dia Mirza blasts Revanth Reddy for AI clip charge on tree felling: Verify factsBollywood actor Dia Mirza has refuted claims by the Telangana Chief Minister that she shared AI-generated fake videos of tree felling in Gachibowli. She urged the CM to verify the facts before making accusations.

Comic Samay Raina reacts to Tony Kakkar's new song with an emotional audio noteStand-up comedian Samay Raina thanked singer Tony Kakkar in an emotional audio note, after he released a song titled Shat Pratishat. The song is seemingly a reply to trolls who attacked Raina and his sister, Neha Kakkar.

Empuraan box office Day 11: Mohanlal's film's unshaken global run amid controversy'L2: Empuraan' is only Rs 2 crore short of hitting a century at the domestic box office. However, the Mohanlal-starrer has already emerged as the highest-grossing Malayalam film of all time globally.

I swear I'll die: Jasleen Royal breaks down into tears after Coldplay concertAfter facing backlash from a Coldplay concert, singer Jasleen Royal reveals she isn't formally trained. She shares her emotional struggle and determination to continue her musical journey.

We are not afraid: Prithviraj Sukumaran's mother on tax notice amid Empuraan row'Empuraan' director Prithviraj Sukumara was issued an income tax notice last week - a development that followed the political controversy that erupted over the film's original content. The actor-director's mother reacted to the issue.

Scene or fan encounter? Man grabs Sreeleela as Kartik walks away in viral videoIn a viral video, actor Sreeleela can be seen being forcibly dragged by a fan. However, the internet is now curious if this was a scene from a film or a shocking fan encounter.

Did Rashmika Mandanna ring in her birthday with Vijay Deverakonda? Fans think soRashmika Mandanna rang in her 29th birthday on April 5. After sharing a few glimpses from her birthday bash in Oman, fans began assuming that Vijay Deverakonda was with her, and here's why.

Ajith Kumar's huge cut-out collapses causing panic among fans. Viral VideoA towering banner of Ajith Kumar collapsed at a Tirunelveli theatre in Tamil Nadu on April 6. A video of fans fleeing from the theatre has now emerged on social media.

Kolkata's Manasi Ghosh wins Indian Idol 15, takes home Rs 25 lakhThe winner of Indian Idol 15 is Manasi Ghosh from Kolkata. She not only won the trophy but also took home a brand-new car along with prize money of Rs 25 lakh.

general news.headline: I can be jailed but..: Mamata Banerjee vows to back sacked Bengal teachersThe Supreme Court's April 3 verdict cited large-scale irregularities and fraud in the recruitment process, leading to the dismissal of thousands of teachers.

Karnataka minister's shocker on Bengaluru molestation: Tends to happen in big cityCCTV footage went viral on social media last week showing a man groping a woman on a street in Bengaluru. The Home Minister directed the police to increase beat patrolling.

India to refrain from counter-tariffs on US despite market meltdown: ReportIndia is unlikely to impose counter-tariffs on the US  and is banking on a key clause in the executive order signed by Donald Trump last week.

'Hypocrites': Indian-origin techie confronts Microsoft bosses, quits over GazaFollowing the confrontation, Vaniya Agrawal dropped a scathing resignation letter, stating that her last day at the office would be April 11. She said she could no longer be part of an organisation that empowers 'oppressors' instead of the oppressed.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 reasons behind stock market crashShare market crash: Dalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

Are Trump's tariffs working? Vietnam, Taiwan offer zero duty on US importsTrump tariffs: Vietnam and Taiwan, among the countries to face the steepest US reciprocal tariffs, have offered to eliminate all levies as the basis for trade talks.

Kerala politician calls Muslim-majority Malappuram 'different country'SNDP yogam general secretary Vellappally Natesan sparked controversy by calling Kerala's Muslim-majority district Malappuram "a different country". This drew sharp reactions from IUML and others, even as he defended his remarks and accused critics of misrepresenting his intent.

Filmmaker Tahira Kashyap's breast cancer relapses, says 'Round 2, but I got this'Tahira Kashyap said she's 'still got this' while expressing her positive outlook towards life in a post mentioning her battle with breast cancer for the second time.

University of Bath School of Management: A Pathway to Global Career SuccessBath's School of Management blends top academics, hands-on learning, and career support to help students secure jobs at leading global companies.

Startup founder from Burhanpur, MP, pours his heart out to Piyush GoyalAfter Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal slammed Indian startups for the lack of innovation and a narrow focus on just e-commerce, a startup founder discussed, in a post on X, how difficult it was to do business in India. Murtaza Amin, who runs an IT services company, BizProspex, from Burhanpur in Madhya Pradesh, revealed the challenges faced by startups in India.

Waqf Act rocks J&K Assembly, chaos and sloganeering as MLAs tear copies of lawAs protests erupted in the assembly, NC MLAs, Hilal Lone and Salman Sagar, tore copies of the Waqf Act. The situation further worsened when NC MLA Abdul Majeed Larmi tore his jacket on the floor of the House in protest.

Millions in India living with undiagnosed chronic illnesses: Apollo reportThe report by Apollo Hospitals zeroes in on three urgent health issues in India: fatty liver disease, post-menopausal health decline, and childhood obesity.

Dia Mirza blasts Revanth Reddy for AI clip charge on tree felling: Verify factsBollywood actor Dia Mirza has refuted claims by the Telangana Chief Minister that she shared AI-generated fake videos of tree felling in Gachibowli. She urged the CM to verify the facts before making accusations.

The veteran actor appeared miffed when the fan requested a photo.

'Orange Monday' memes flood X after global markets sink due to Trump's tariffs'Orange Monday' made it to the top of the trends list after Asian stock indexes tumbled overnight, triggering major turmoil in global markets.

India's Skyroot successfully fires Kalam-100 to power Vikram-1 rocket to spaceThis test builds upon previous successes, including a fixed-nozzle static fire test, demonstrating Skyroot's technological prowess in rocket propulsion systems.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

We are not afraid: Prithviraj Sukumaran's mother on tax notice amid Empuraan row'Empuraan' director Prithviraj Sukumara was issued an income tax notice last week - a development that followed the political controversy that erupted over the film's original content. The actor-director's mother reacted to the issue.

Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

Shinde joke row: Kunal Kamra calls FIR malicious, approaches court to cancel itComedian Kunal Kamra approached the Bombay High Court, challenging the 'legality, correctness, and propriety' of the FIR registered against him in connection with the 'gaddar' jibe directed at Eknath Shinde during his stand-up show.

Indian Idol 15 winner Manasi Ghosh: Want to collab with AR Rahman, Sonu NigamKolkata's Manasi Ghosh was crowned the winner of Indian Idol 15 on Sunday. In an exclusive chat, she shared her aspirations of collaborating with music legends like AR Rahman and Sonu Nigam. She emphasised her journey of hard work, diverse singing capabilities, and future plans.

18-year-old millionaire CEO writes open letter to Harvard, Yale after rejectionZach Yadegari, an 18-year-old US-based millionaire CEO, shared an open letter to top universities for rejecting him. In it, he urged colleges to prioritise merit over diversity.

1 killed, 6 injured after 'drunk' TV director's car rams crowd in Kolkata marketFollowing the incident, both people in the car were stopped by locals and beaten by the agitated crowd before being handed over to the police. As officers rushed to the spot to rescue them, an official told India Today TV that the co-passenger, Shriya Basu, appeared to be intoxicated and collapsed on the road.

sports.headline: MI and Charlotte Edwards part ways as WPL-winning coach takes England jobCharlotte Edwards leaves Mumbai Indians after guiding them to two WPL titles. The England legend now takes on the challenge of coaching her national side, aiming to revive their form after disappointing World Cup and Ashes campaigns under Jon Lewis.

Jasprit Bumrah vs Virat Kohli: Wankhede prepares for epic battleMumbai Indians pacer Jasprit Bumrah has joined the side ahead of their home game against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. If Bumrah plays, his battle against Virat Kohli might turn out to be a spectacle.

MI vs RCB Match Preview: Bumrah's return sets big challenge for BengaluruIPL 2025, MI vs RCB Match Preview: Mumbai Indians got a major boost with Jasprit Bumrah's possible return as they gear up for a crucial Wankhede clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru, while doubts remain over Rohit Sharma's fitness ahead of the high-stakes Monday night battle.

R Ashwin's YouTube channel to not cover remaining CSK games in IPL 2025IPL 2025: Ravi Ashwin's YouTube channel will not be covering CSK matches going forward. Ashwin's YouTube admin explained the reason behind taking the decision to keep away from content related to CSK.

Ishant Sharma fined 25 per cent match fees for breach of conduct vs SRHGujarat Titans fast bowler Ishant Sharma has been fined 25 per cent of his match fees for breaching the code of conduct vs SRH. Ishant is the fifth player to be fined this season.

Nehra passes his game knowledge to us: Prasidh Krishna praises GT coachGujarat Titans pacer Prasidh Krishna heaped praise on his side's head coach Ashish Nehra, highlighting how the former India pacer helps his side's bowling attack by passing on his own game knowledge to them.

Sourav Ganguly praises GT coach Ashish Nehra after thumping win vs SRHFormer India captain Sourav Ganguly heaped praise on Gujarat Titans coach Ashish Nehra after they beat SunRisers Hyderabad away from home. Ganguly said that Nehra had tremendous game sense.

Jasprit Bumrah is back: MI's bowling leader returns with season in balanceJasprit Bumrah returns to the Mumbai Indians squad at the right time with their IPL 2025 campaign in the balance. The star pacer will have his tails up and raring to go as he will be tasked with galvanising the team once again.

MI vs RCB Live Score: Can Bengaluru handle Bumrah's return?Mumbai Indians (MI) vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) Live Score, IPL 2025: While IPL walks into its more competitive stages with each team having played more than two matches respectively, the intensity amongst both fans and players has already started to amp up. In terms of fresh action, Mumbai Indians take on Royal Challengers Bengaluru at Wankhede, which might even feature the return of Jasprit Bumrah.

SRH coach Vettori continues to back aggressive style despite GT thrashingAfter suffering their fourth loss of the season with a defeat to Gujarat Titans, SRH head coach Daniel Vettori still backed his team's aggressive style, insisting it can succeed again with better reading of conditions moving forward.

SRH's bowling and not batting hurting them the most in IPL 2025: Ambati RayuduAmbati Rayudu feels that SRH's bowling is hurting them more this season than their batting after losing to Gujarat Titans on Sunday, April 6. Hyderabad lost their 4th game on the trot.

Watch: Washington Sundar recreates famous Gabba six against Sunrisers HyderabadGujarat Titans all-rounder Washington Sundar re-created his famous six from the Gabba Test 2021 during his match-winning innings against Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

How Mohammed Siraj used India axe for IPL rebirth: Told myself my cricket isn't overGT pacer Mohammed Siraj revealed how he used the Indian team snub as motivation for his rebirth in IPL. Siraj picked up 4 wickets against SRH on Sunday in front of his home crowd.

Mohammed Siraj joins Jasprit Bumrah in prestigious IPL list after 4/17 vs SRHMohammed Siraj joined Jasprit Bumrah in an elite list of bowlers as he picked up career-best figures of 4 for 17 during the SRH vs GT clash on Sunday, April 6. Siraj has been in sensational form since joining GT.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

Tim David on approach vs Jasprit Bumrah: 1st ball will go for four or sixRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Tim David opened up on the team's plan to counter Jasprit Bumrah in the clash against Mumbai Indians (MI) in Match 20 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

Real Madrid Legends vs Barcelona Legends: Morientes, Barral hand Los Blancos winFernando Morientes and David Barral were on the score sheet as the Real Madrid legends defeated Barcelona legends in the El Clasico legends faceoff on Sunday, April 6.

LSG's Digvesh Rathi meets idol Sunil Narine, gives hilarious reason for celebrationLucknow Super Giants mystery spinner Digvesh Rathi finally got his wish as he met his idol and Kolkata Knight Riders star Sunil Narine on Sunday, April 6 at the Eden Gardens. KKR and LSG will square off on April 8.

Rohit Sharma deemed fit for RCB clash by MI coach Jayawardene: He looks goodMumbai Indians coach Mahela Jayawardene has said that Rohit Sharma is fit for the clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru on Monday, April 7. Rohit had missed the last game due to a knee injury.

IPL 2025: Sundar makes debut for GT, Unadkat replaces Harshal Patel in SRHGujarat Titans and Sunrisers Hyderabad have made one change each to their playing XI ahead of Match 19 in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). GT handed debut cap to Washington Sundar while Jaydev Unadkat replaced an ill Harshal Patel in SRH.

Jasprit Bumrah lifted up by Kieron Pollard, fans say 'handle with care'Kieron Pollard was elated to see Jasprit Bumrah back with MI as the Mumbai batting coach lifted the pacer in the air ahead of the practice session. Fans, however, asked Pollard to be careful with Bumrah in the comments section of the video released by MI.

Tilak Varma still MI's match-winner despite retire out call: Mahela JayawardeneMI coach Mahela Jayawardene has claimed that Tilak Varma is still a match-winner for the team despite his controversial retire-out call during the loss to LSG. Jayawardene continued to defend the call.

Brand Dhoni is alive: Ex-player wants MS to stay amid retirement rumoursFormer cricketer Sreevats Goswami has said that MS Dhoni should continue to play in the Indian Premier League. Goswami's comments come amidst rumours of Dhoni's retirement.

KKR's Rinku Singh admits being nervous about India debut, explains 2:20 tattooKKR's Rinku Singh admitted that he was nervous about his India debut as the game was affected by rain. Rinku made his India debut during the Ireland tour in August 2023.

Jasprit Bumrah available for Mumbai's next fixture, confirms Mahela JayawardeneJasprit Bumrah is available for selection in Mumbai Indians' next fixture against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB), revealed their head coach Mahela Jaywardene in the pre-match press conference.

KL Rahul joins T20 party with mental shift: Strike rate no longer overrated?KL Rahul steered Delhi Capitals to a win against Chennai Super Kings on April 5. After the match, Rahul revealed a key change in his mentality in T20 cricket.

Watch: MS Dhoni arrives in Chandigarh for PBKS vs CSK amidst retirement rumoursAmidst all the speculation about his future, MS Dhoni arrived in Chandigarh for Chennai Super Kings' clash against Punjab Kings. Dhoni's future is under the scanner after CSK's loss to DC on April 5.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
